TopicTitle: Is there a kerbal changer mod?

Articles.Content: I have noticed that in some fan-fics like Emiko Station, people have kerbals with many colors of hair and suit colors and sometimes earpieces. Does anyone know a mod for this?

Texture Replacer can change suits, and there are a few suit packs out there (Cetera's Suit Pack is one).  There is another mod for ear & eye pieces but I can't remember it.  I think it uses Texture Replacer also.
Following up on what @Cavscout74 said...there are many packs out there. There's a huge list of options on the old Texture Replacer forum page. Not sure if they all still work, but lots to explore
Texture Replacer Replaced is the current incarnation of that, although last I checked they were still working out compatibility with the new suits.
